workerManagerConstructionJobDistribution

Class WorkerManagerConstructionJobDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • workerManagerConstructionJobDistribution.WorkerManagerConstructionJobDistribution

  • public class WorkerManagerConstructionJobDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    WorkerManagerConstructionJobDistribution.java --- The Class managing the Player's construction of buildings. Workers can add themselves to an instance of this Class and receive a ConstructionJob which they then can pursue.
    Possible buildings that are going to be constructed are added towards the building Queue which acts as a Collection for them. Units / buildings of constructions that have already begun must be added towards the HashSet of currently constructed buildings (addToCurrentlyConstructedBuildings(Unit)) since the ConstructionJobs are changing their state upon these information.
    Author:
    P H - 05.09.2017

    • Method Detail

      • addToBuildingQueue

        public void addToBuildingQueue(bwapi.UnitType unitType)
        Function for adding a new UnitType to the building Queue. This UnitType is going to be wrapped into a ConstructionJob and later build by a worker.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the type of building that is going to be constructed.

      • canConstruct

        public boolean canConstruct()
        Function for testing if the next element in the building Queue can be afforded and constructed. If it does not, the element is moved to the back of the Queue for later testing.
        Returns:
        true if the next element in the building Queue can be afforded and constructed.

      • addWorker

        public boolean addWorker(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for adding a new worker to the manager. Only works, if the next element in the building Queue can actually be constructed and wrapped into a ConstructionJob.
        Parameters:
        worker - the ConstructionWorker that is going to be constructing the next building in the building Queue and assigned a ConstructionJob.
        Returns:
        true if the next element in the building Queue can be constructed as well as afforded and the provided worker was assigned to a ConstructionJob containing this building. False if either the next element can not be build or the worker was not successfully assigned.

      • isAssignedConstructing

        public boolean isAssignedConstructing(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for testing if a ConstructionWorker is assigned to a ConstructionJob or not.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be tested for.
        Returns:
        true if the provided worker is assigned to a ConstructionJob, false if not.

      • getConstructionInformation

        public IConstrucionInformation getConstructionInformation(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for retrieving the IConstrucionInformation of a provided ConstructionWorker. This represents the ConstructionJob that the specific worker is assigned to.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker whose IConstrucionInformation are retrieved.
        Returns:
        the IConstrucionInformation / ConstructionJob of the provided ConstructionWorker or null if the worker is not assigned to one.

      • updateConstructionStatus

        public void updateConstructionStatus(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for passing an update cycle to the assigned ConstructionJob of the provided ConstructionWorker. Mainly used for updating the state of the job.
        Parameters:
        worker - the ConstructionWorker whose ConstructionJob is going to be updated.

      • addToCurrentlyConstructedBuildings

        public void addToCurrentlyConstructedBuildings(bwapi.Unit building)
        Function for adding a building / Unit to the ones that are currently being constructed / build. This is necessary for the ConstructionJobs to know since the resources they reserved must eventually be freed. Therefore knowing which Units / buildings are currently being constructed is necessary.
        Parameters:
        building - the building that is currently being constructed.

      • isFinishedConstructing

        public boolean isFinishedConstructing(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for testing if the provided ConstructionWorker finished his assigned ConstructionJob. For this function to work the updateConstructionStatus(ConstructionWorker) as well as the addToCurrentlyConstructedBuildings(Unit) functions must be called since this function utilizes the internal construction state of the ConstructionJob which in return requires the assignment of a constructed building.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker whose ConstructionJob is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the ConstructionJob of the provided ConstructionWorker is finished, false if not.

      • removeWorker

        public boolean removeWorker(ConstructionWorker worker)
        Function for removing a worker from any saved ConstructionJob as well as the ConstructionJob itself from the manager.
        Parameters:
        worker - the worker that is going to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the worker was successfully removed, false if not.

      • removeBuilding

        public boolean removeBuilding(bwapi.Unit building)
        Function for removing a building from the currently saved ConstructionJobs.
        Parameters:
        building - the building that is going to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if the building was successfully removed, false if not.
